actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow penalty-free withdrawals from retirement plans to provide medical care for relatives who are 55 years old or older.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit penalty-free withdrawals from retirement plans to provide medical care for qualified relatives over the age of 55.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow penalty-free withdrawals from retirement plans to provide medical care for relatives who are 55 years old or older.
